channel.title: Product on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Product on SoftLayer API

item.title: acceptFromTicket
item.description:
REST Example 

curl -g -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X POST -d '{"parameters": [int]}' \
'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_Product_Item_Policy_Assignment/{SoftLayer_Product_Item_Policy_AssignmentID}/acceptFromTicket'
